text: God of War III is a 2010 hack and slash video game released on the PlayStation 3 and a sequel to 2007's God of War II. ==Gameplay== Kratos can use the Blades of Athena to attack enemies and gain abilities from picked up items and red orbs. ==Plot== Kratos and the Titans climbed up to Mount Olympus to stop his father, Zeus. The Titans eventually betrayed Kratos. title: God of War III
